reviewText: Very happy with my purchase and delivery
Classic classic work A plan to collect many more thanks for listening

The individual video clips format is a pain in the heart.  I didn't allow me to enjoy the recipes at all.

Cordially,

Carmen A. Hernandez

This is a great DVD. When I ordered it, I didn't realize that it was only appetizers. Wonderful recipes. I love the interview and assistance of her friends. Can't wait to try some of the recipes. This DVD was great as a stocking stuffer gift.
i am so happy to have found this treasure of recipes. B. Smith is truly a gem. I plan to get more videos in the future!  :)

I purchased this video for me and my granddaughters.  They are learning to cook.  B. Smith is much better at describing what she is doing than I am and we all enjoy it.  She makes cooking enjoyable and fun.

Such a classy intelligent beautiful lady-my heart goes out to her and her family during this trying time. She is so fortunate to have her Dan who loves her so much and is do devoted. Her talents, taste, and products are a rare combination of classic timeless skill and caring.
Dated video, but if you LOVE B. Smith, you will enjoy seeing her here.
Dated video, but if you LOVE B. Smith, you will enjoy seeing her here. Recipes are interesting.
Dated video, but if you LOVE B. Smith, you will enjoy seeing her here.

- A Slight Taste Of Barbara -

 Not in TV Show Format. Music Intro sung by B. NOT included. . . .  very stringent layout. Cold. Very short segment time and not many segments.
Low Quality Video and Editing. Didn't seem to be that fuzzy originally on broadcast television.
I wanted to give someone special a keepsake of this trailblazer from her television days but the manufacturer failed to deliver a professional product.
It is still nice to see her again. The cooking is just fine just be prepared to be underwhelmed by the finished video product.
